document_data.title: Six Faces of Death
document_data.author: [[Jason Thompson|Jason Bradley Thompson]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''"Six Faces of Death"''' is an adventure for [[Dungeons & Dragons]] 5{{th}} edition published in [[Dragon+ 21]].
{{Quote|An alien being, dark omens, and vanishing ships send the adventurers to a mysterious island newly appeared in the Sea of Swords. But can the characters uncover the mysteries of the Changing Island in time to save Faerûn from a terror from another plane?}}

Index.Organizations:
::{{Refonly}}
::[[Watchful Order of Magists and Protectors]] • [[Cowled Wizards]] • [[Zhentarim]]
